title: Calgary Script slideshow
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019074546im_/http:/typophile.com/files/CCP0013861_3553.jpg)

I really like the [Stampede slideshow](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019074546/http:/www.veer.com/ideas/galleries/calgaryscript/) that the Veer guys did for my [Calgary Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019074546/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=UMT0000326) font
author: Ale Paul
